directions: Prepare Knorr(R) Rice Sides(TM) - Cheddar Broccoli with water and Spread according to package directions, stirring in tomato with contents of package.
Meanwhile, brown ground beef in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally; drain. Toss with hot Rice Sides.
Top, if desired, with tomato slices.
ingredients: 1 (5.7 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Cheddar Broccoli
1 tablespoon I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread
title: Cheeseburger Dinner
